author: SkinnyTaste
name: Broiled or Grilled Pollo Sabroso
instructions: Season chicken with vinegar and soy sauce. Add sazon, 1 teaspoon of adobo, garlic powder, oregano and adobo and mix well. (Don't use your hands or they will turn orange) Let chicken marinate while you heat the grill. Broil or grill on low until chicken is cooked through, turning a few times, careful not to burn, about 30 minutes. Enjoy with rice and salad.
